paragraphs: Hi, I’m Yuan-Che — a Full-Stack & Cloud-Focused Software Engineer.

I design and build scalable, production-ready systems across the full development cycle—from frontend interfaces and backend APIs to databases, cloud deployments, and CI/CD automation. My work emphasizes clean architecture, reliability, and developer-friendly design.

I currently serve as a Software Development Engineer (RDSS) at eZoom Information, where I work across the full stack using Vue, .NET 8 / C#, Python FastAPI, and MSSQL / PostgreSQL. I develop system features end-to-end: writing SA documents, planning database schemas, implementing backend services, building frontend UI, and deploying applications to Windows Server + IIS with automated pipelines.

Beyond application development, I maintain experience in cloud-native technologies, including containerization with Docker, deployment on Google Cloud Run, and creating GitHub Actions CI/CD workflows used in production environments.

Previously, I completed my master’s degree at National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University, specializing in quantum systems, scientific computing, and numerical algorithms. This background strengthened my analytical mindset and ability to design efficient, mathematically grounded solutions—skills that directly inform my engineering work today.

I am motivated by building practical, reliable software products, bridging backend systems with real-world workflows, and constantly pushing for better architecture, automation, and developer experience.
